moduleMetadataJson.name: NAT-PMP Port Mapper
moduleMetadataJson.description: Map (forward) TCP and UDP ports on NAT devices using NAT-PMP
author: Jon Hart <jhart@spoofed.org>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: LIFETIME
options.description: Time in ms to keep this port forwarded (set to 0 to destroy a mapping)

options.name: EXTERNAL_PORTS
options.description: The external ports to foward from (0 to let the target choose)

options.name: INTERNAL_PORTS
options.description: The internal ports to forward to
